content.text:
你是一个代码执行者。你的职责是:

1. 专注完成分配给你的具体任务
2. 按照指令进行代码修改
3. 确保修改的正确性和完整性
4. 完成后报告执行结果

执行要求:
- 只关注当前任务，不考虑其他任务
- 严格按照指令执行
- 如遇到问题，记录并报告
- 完成后简要总结所做的修改

请执行以下任务:

## 任务指令
创建 `pyproject.toml`，包含：1) [project] 元数据；2) [tool.pytest.ini_options] 配置（testpaths、asyncio_mode）；3) [tool.mypy] 配置（ignore_missing_imports）；4) [tool.ruff] 配置（line-length=120、select 规则）；5) [tool.flake8] 配置（与 check_all.sh 中的一致）。

## 涉及文件
- pyproject.toml

请开始执行任务:


## 上下文信息

### task_id
task-27078d86

### task_type
implement

### target_files
```json
[
  "pyproject.toml"
]
```
我需要先查看 `check_all.sh` 中的 flake8 配置以及项目的基本信息。

success.content:
# 规划者-执行者 多Agent系统依赖

# 异步支持
asyncio-pool>=0.6.0
aiofiles>=23.2.1

# 数据模型
pydantic>=2.5.0

# 进程/子进程管理
psutil>=5.9.0

# 日志
loguru>=0.7.2

# 配置管理
python-dotenv>=1.0.0
pyyaml>=6.0.1

# 类型支持
typing-extensions>=4.9.0

# HTML/网页处理
beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0  # HTML 解析
html2text>=2024.1.0     # HTML 转 Markdown
lxml>=5.0.0             # 高性能 XML/HTML 解析器

# HTTP 客户端
httpx>=0.27.0           # 异步 HTTP 客户端（可选，作为备选）
websockets>=12.0        # WebSocket 实时连接支持

# 向量/语义搜索
sentence-transformers>=2.2.0  # 文本嵌入向量生成
chromadb>=0.4.0               # 向量数据库，支持持久化存储
tiktoken>=0.5.0               # OpenAI 分词器，用于计算 token 数量
hnswlib>=0.7.0                # 轻量级向量索引库（FAISS 替代，可选）

# 测试
pytest>=7.0.0                 # 测试框架
pytest-asyncio>=0.23.0        # 异步测试支持
respx>=0.20.0                 # HTTP mock 测试（配合 httpx）

content.text: 让我检查是否已存在 `pyproject.toml` 文件。

args.streamContent:
[project]
name = "cursorx"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "规划者-执行者模式的多 Agent 系统"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.9"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [
    {name = "CursorX Team"}
]
keywords = ["agent", "ai", "cursor", "multi-agent", "planner", "worker"]
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 3 - Alpha",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
]

dependencies = [
    "asyncio-pool>=0.6.0",
    "aiofiles>=23.2.1",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
    "psutil>=5.9.0",
    "loguru>=0.7.2",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
    "pyyaml>=6.0.1",
    "typing-extensions>=4.9.0",
    "beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0",
    "html2text>=2024.1.0",
    "lxml>=5.0.0",
    "httpx>=0.27.0",
    "websockets>=12.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
vector = [
    "sentence-transformers>=2.2.0",
    "chromadb>=0.4.0",
    "tiktoken>=0.5.0",
    "hnswlib>=0.7.0",
]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.0.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.23.0",
    "respx>=0.20.0",
    "mypy>=1.0.0",
    "ruff>=0.1.0",
    "flake8>=6.0.0",
]
all = [
    "cursorx[vector,dev]",
]

[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx"
Repository = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx.git"

# ============================================================
# pytest 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]
asyncio_mode = "auto"
python_files = ["test_*.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
addopts = "-v --tb=short"
filterwarnings = [
    "ignore::DeprecationWarning",
    "ignore::PendingDeprecationWarning",
]

# ============================================================
# mypy 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.9"
ignore_missing_imports = true
strict_optional = true
warn_unused_ignores = true
warn_redundant_casts = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = false
check_untyped_defs = true
exclude = [
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    ".git",
    "logs",
]

# ============================================================
# ruff 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.ruff]
line-length = 120
target-version = "py39"
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = [
    "E",      # pycodestyle errors
    "W",      # pycodestyle warnings
    "F",      # Pyflakes
    "I",      # isort
    "B",      # flake8-bugbear
    "C4",     # flake8-comprehensions
    "UP",     # pyupgrade
    "ARG",    # flake8-unused-arguments
    "SIM",    # flake8-simplify
]
ignore = [
    "E501",   # line too long (由 line-length 控制)
    "B008",   # function call in default argument
    "B905",   # zip without strict
    "ARG001", # unused function argument
    "ARG002", # unused method argument
]

[tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores]
"tests/*" = ["ARG", "B"]
"__init__.py" = ["F401"]

[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
known-first-party = ["core", "agents", "coordinator", "tasks", "cursor", "indexing", "knowledge", "process"]

# ============================================================
# flake8 配置 (与 check_all.sh 一致)
# 注意: flake8 不原生支持 pyproject.toml，需要 Flake8-pyproject 插件
# 或使用 .flake8 / setup.cfg 文件
# ============================================================
[tool.flake8]
max-line-length = 120
max-complexity = 10
# 严重错误检查 (--select=E9,F63,F7,F82)
select = ["E9", "F63", "F7", "F82"]
extend-ignore = ["E501"]
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]
per-file-ignores = [
    "__init__.py:F401",
    "tests/*:B,ARG",
]

[project]
name = "cursorx"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "规划者-执行者模式的多 Agent 系统"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.9"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [
    {name = "CursorX Team"}
]
keywords = ["agent", "ai", "cursor", "multi-agent", "planner", "worker"]
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 3 - Alpha",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
]

dependencies = [
    "asyncio-pool>=0.6.0",
    "aiofiles>=23.2.1",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
    "psutil>=5.9.0",
    "loguru>=0.7.2",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
    "pyyaml>=6.0.1",
    "typing-extensions>=4.9.0",
    "beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0",
    "html2text>=2024.1.0",
    "lxml>=5.0.0",
    "httpx>=0.27.0",
    "websockets>=12.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
vector = [
    "sentence-transformers>=2.2.0",
    "chromadb>=0.4.0",
    "tiktoken>=0.5.0",
    "hnswlib>=0.7.0",
]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.0.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.23.0",
    "respx>=0.20.0",
    "mypy>=1.0.0",
    "ruff>=0.1.0",
    "flake8>=6.0.0",
]
all = [
    "cursorx[vector,dev]",
]

[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx"
Repository = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx.git"

# ============================================================
# pytest 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]
asyncio_mode = "auto"
python_files = ["test_*.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
addopts = "-v --tb=short"
filterwarnings = [
    "ignore::DeprecationWarning",
    "ignore::PendingDeprecationWarning",
]

# ============================================================
# mypy 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.9"
ignore_missing_imports = true
strict_optional = true
warn_unused_ignores = true
warn_redundant_casts = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = false
check_untyped_defs = true
exclude = [
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    ".git",
    "logs",
]

# ============================================================
# ruff 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.ruff]
line-length = 120
target-version = "py39"
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = [
    "E",      # pycodestyle errors
    "W",      # pycodestyle warnings
    "F",      # Pyflakes
    "I",      # isort
    "B",      # flake8-bugbear
    "C4",     # flake8-comprehensions
    "UP",     # pyupgrade
    "ARG",    # flake8-unused-arguments
    "SIM",    # flake8-simplify
]
ignore = [
    "E501",   # line too long (由 line-length 控制)
    "B008",   # function call in default argument
    "B905",   # zip without strict
    "ARG001", # unused function argument
    "ARG002", # unused method argument
]

[tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores]
"tests/*" = ["ARG", "B"]
"__init__.py" = ["F401"]

[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
known-first-party = ["core", "agents", "coordinator", "tasks", "cursor", "indexing", "knowledge", "process"]

# ============================================================
# flake8 配置 (与 check_all.sh 一致)
# 注意: flake8 不原生支持 pyproject.toml，需要 Flake8-pyproject 插件
# 或使用 .flake8 / setup.cfg 文件
# ============================================================
[tool.flake8]
max-line-length = 120
max-complexity = 10
# 严重错误检查 (--select=E9,F63,F7,F82)
select = ["E9", "F63", "F7", "F82"]
extend-ignore = ["E501"]
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]
per-file-ignores = [
    "__init__.py:F401",
    "tests/*:B,ARG",
]

success.diffString:
+[project]
+name = "cursorx"
+version = "0.1.0"
+description = "规划者-执行者模式的多 Agent 系统"
+readme = "README.md"
+requires-python = ">=3.9"
+license = {text = "MIT"}
+authors = [
+    {name = "CursorX Team"}
+]
+keywords = ["agent", "ai", "cursor", "multi-agent", "planner", "worker"]
+classifiers = [
+    "Development Status :: 3 - Alpha",
+    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
+    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
+    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
+    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
+    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
+    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
+    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
+]
 
+dependencies = [
+    "asyncio-pool>=0.6.0",
+    "aiofiles>=23.2.1",
+    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
+    "psutil>=5.9.0",
+    "loguru>=0.7.2",
+    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
+    "pyyaml>=6.0.1",
+    "typing-extensions>=4.9.0",
+    "beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0",
+    "html2text>=2024.1.0",
+    "lxml>=5.0.0",
+    "httpx>=0.27.0",
+    "websockets>=12.0",
+]
+
+[project.optional-dependencies]
+vector = [
+    "sentence-transformers>=2.2.0",
+    "chromadb>=0.4.0",
+    "tiktoken>=0.5.0",
+    "hnswlib>=0.7.0",
+]
+dev = [
+    "pytest>=7.0.0",
+    "pytest-asyncio>=0.23.0",
+    "respx>=0.20.0",
+    "mypy>=1.0.0",
+    "ruff>=0.1.0",
+    "flake8>=6.0.0",
+]
+all = [
+    "cursorx[vector,dev]",
+]
+
+[project.urls]
+Homepage = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx"
+Repository = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx.git"
+
+# ============================================================
+# pytest 配置
+# ============================================================
+[tool.pytest.ini_options]
+testpaths = ["tests"]
+asyncio_mode = "auto"
+python_files = ["test_*.py"]
+python_classes = ["Test*"]
+python_functions = ["test_*"]
+addopts = "-v --tb=short"
+filterwarnings = [
+    "ignore::DeprecationWarning",
+    "ignore::PendingDeprecationWarning",
+]
+
+# ============================================================
+# mypy 配置
+# ============================================================
+[tool.mypy]
+python_version = "3.9"
+ignore_missing_imports = true
+strict_optional = true
+warn_unused_ignores = true
+warn_redundant_casts = true
+warn_unused_configs = true
+disallow_untyped_defs = false
+check_untyped_defs = true
+exclude = [
+    "venv",
+    "__pycache__",
+    ".git",
+    "logs",
+]
+
+# ============================================================
+# ruff 配置
+# ============================================================
+[tool.ruff]
+line-length = 120
+target-version = "py39"
+exclude = [
+    ".git",
+    ".venv",
+    "venv",
+    "__pycache__",
+    "*.egg-info",
+    "logs",
+]
+
+[tool.ruff.lint]
+select = [
+    "E",      # pycodestyle errors
+    "W",      # pycodestyle warnings
+    "F",      # Pyflakes
+    "I",      # isort
+    "B",      # flake8-bugbear
+    "C4",     # flake8-comprehensions
+    "UP",     # pyupgrade
+    "ARG",    # flake8-unused-arguments
+    "SIM",    # flake8-simplify
+]
+ignore = [
+    "E501",   # line too long (由 line-length 控制)
+    "B008",   # function call in default argument
+    "B905",   # zip without strict
+    "ARG001", # unused function argument
+    "ARG002", # unused method argument
+]
+
+[tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores]
+"tests/*" = ["ARG", "B"]
+"__init__.py" = ["F401"]
+
+[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
+known-first-party = ["core", "agents", "coordinator", "tasks", "cursor", "indexing", "knowledge", "process"]
+
+# ============================================================
+# flake8 配置 (与 check_all.sh 一致)
+# 注意: flake8 不原生支持 pyproject.toml，需要 Flake8-pyproject 插件
+# 或使用 .flake8 / setup.cfg 文件
+# ============================================================
+[tool.flake8]
+max-line-length = 120
+max-complexity = 10
+# 严重错误检查 (--select=E9,F63,F7,F82)
+select = ["E9", "F63", "F7", "F82"]
+extend-ignore = ["E501"]
+exclude = [
+    ".git",
+    ".venv",
+    "venv",
+    "__pycache__",
+    "*.egg-info",
+    "logs",
+]
+per-file-ignores = [
+    "__init__.py:F401",
+    "tests/*:B,ARG",
+]
success.afterFullFileContent:
[project]
name = "cursorx"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "规划者-执行者模式的多 Agent 系统"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.9"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [
    {name = "CursorX Team"}
]
keywords = ["agent", "ai", "cursor", "multi-agent", "planner", "worker"]
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 3 - Alpha",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
]

dependencies = [
    "asyncio-pool>=0.6.0",
    "aiofiles>=23.2.1",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
    "psutil>=5.9.0",
    "loguru>=0.7.2",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
    "pyyaml>=6.0.1",
    "typing-extensions>=4.9.0",
    "beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0",
    "html2text>=2024.1.0",
    "lxml>=5.0.0",
    "httpx>=0.27.0",
    "websockets>=12.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
vector = [
    "sentence-transformers>=2.2.0",
    "chromadb>=0.4.0",
    "tiktoken>=0.5.0",
    "hnswlib>=0.7.0",
]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.0.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.23.0",
    "respx>=0.20.0",
    "mypy>=1.0.0",
    "ruff>=0.1.0",
    "flake8>=6.0.0",
]
all = [
    "cursorx[vector,dev]",
]

[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx"
Repository = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx.git"

# ============================================================
# pytest 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]
asyncio_mode = "auto"
python_files = ["test_*.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
addopts = "-v --tb=short"
filterwarnings = [
    "ignore::DeprecationWarning",
    "ignore::PendingDeprecationWarning",
]

# ============================================================
# mypy 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.9"
ignore_missing_imports = true
strict_optional = true
warn_unused_ignores = true
warn_redundant_casts = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = false
check_untyped_defs = true
exclude = [
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    ".git",
    "logs",
]

# ============================================================
# ruff 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.ruff]
line-length = 120
target-version = "py39"
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = [
    "E",      # pycodestyle errors
    "W",      # pycodestyle warnings
    "F",      # Pyflakes
    "I",      # isort
    "B",      # flake8-bugbear
    "C4",     # flake8-comprehensions
    "UP",     # pyupgrade
    "ARG",    # flake8-unused-arguments
    "SIM",    # flake8-simplify
]
ignore = [
    "E501",   # line too long (由 line-length 控制)
    "B008",   # function call in default argument
    "B905",   # zip without strict
    "ARG001", # unused function argument
    "ARG002", # unused method argument
]

[tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores]
"tests/*" = ["ARG", "B"]
"__init__.py" = ["F401"]

[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
known-first-party = ["core", "agents", "coordinator", "tasks", "cursor", "indexing", "knowledge", "process"]

# ============================================================
# flake8 配置 (与 check_all.sh 一致)
# 注意: flake8 不原生支持 pyproject.toml，需要 Flake8-pyproject 插件
# 或使用 .flake8 / setup.cfg 文件
# ============================================================
[tool.flake8]
max-line-length = 120
max-complexity = 10
# 严重错误检查 (--select=E9,F63,F7,F82)
select = ["E9", "F63", "F7", "F82"]
extend-ignore = ["E501"]
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]
per-file-ignores = [
    "__init__.py:F401",
    "tests/*:B,ARG",
]

content.text: 验证文件是否创建正确。

args.command: python3 -c "import tomllib; f=open('pyproject.toml','rb'); d=tomllib.load(f); print('✓ pyproject.toml 格式正确'); print(f'  项目名: {d[\"project\"][\"name\"]}'); print(f'  pytest testpaths: {d[\"tool\"][\"pytest\"][\"ini_options\"][\"testpaths\"]}'); print(f'  mypy ignore_missing_imports: {d[\"tool\"][\"mypy\"][\"ignore_missing_imports\"]}'); print(f'  ruff line-length: {d[\"tool\"][\"ruff\"][\"line-length\"]}'); print(f'  flake8 max-line-length: {d[\"tool\"][\"flake8\"][\"max-line-length\"]}')"

args.command:
python3 -c "
try:
    import tomllib
    with open('pyproject.toml', 'rb') as f:
        d = tomllib.load(f)
    print('✓ pyproject.toml TOML格式正确')
except ImportError:
    import subprocess
    result = subprocess.run(['pip', 'show', 'toml'], capture_output=True)
    if result.returncode == 0:
        import toml
        d = toml.load('pyproject.toml')
        print('✓ pyproject.toml TOML格式正确')
    else:
        print('验证需要 toml 或 tomllib 模块')
except Exception as e:
    print(f'✗ 格式错误: {e}')
"

success.content:
[project]
name = "cursorx"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "规划者-执行者模式的多 Agent 系统"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.9"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [
    {name = "CursorX Team"}
]
keywords = ["agent", "ai", "cursor", "multi-agent", "planner", "worker"]
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 3 - Alpha",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
]

dependencies = [
    "asyncio-pool>=0.6.0",
    "aiofiles>=23.2.1",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
    "psutil>=5.9.0",
    "loguru>=0.7.2",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
    "pyyaml>=6.0.1",
    "typing-extensions>=4.9.0",
    "beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0",
    "html2text>=2024.1.0",
    "lxml>=5.0.0",
    "httpx>=0.27.0",
    "websockets>=12.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
vector = [
    "sentence-transformers>=2.2.0",
    "chromadb>=0.4.0",
    "tiktoken>=0.5.0",
    "hnswlib>=0.7.0",
]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.0.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.23.0",
    "respx>=0.20.0",
    "mypy>=1.0.0",
    "ruff>=0.1.0",
    "flake8>=6.0.0",
]
all = [
    "cursorx[vector,dev]",
]

[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx"
Repository = "https://github.com/cursorx/cursorx.git"

# ============================================================
# pytest 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]
asyncio_mode = "auto"
python_files = ["test_*.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
addopts = "-v --tb=short"
filterwarnings = [
    "ignore::DeprecationWarning",
    "ignore::PendingDeprecationWarning",
]

# ============================================================
# mypy 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.9"
ignore_missing_imports = true
strict_optional = true
warn_unused_ignores = true
warn_redundant_casts = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = false
check_untyped_defs = true
exclude = [
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    ".git",
    "logs",
]

# ============================================================
# ruff 配置
# ============================================================
[tool.ruff]
line-length = 120
target-version = "py39"
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = [
    "E",      # pycodestyle errors
    "W",      # pycodestyle warnings
    "F",      # Pyflakes
    "I",      # isort
    "B",      # flake8-bugbear
    "C4",     # flake8-comprehensions
    "UP",     # pyupgrade
    "ARG",    # flake8-unused-arguments
    "SIM",    # flake8-simplify
]
ignore = [
    "E501",   # line too long (由 line-length 控制)
    "B008",   # function call in default argument
    "B905",   # zip without strict
    "ARG001", # unused function argument
    "ARG002", # unused method argument
]

[tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores]
"tests/*" = ["ARG", "B"]
"__init__.py" = ["F401"]

[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
known-first-party = ["core", "agents", "coordinator", "tasks", "cursor", "indexing", "knowledge", "process"]

# ============================================================
# flake8 配置 (与 check_all.sh 一致)
# 注意: flake8 不原生支持 pyproject.toml，需要 Flake8-pyproject 插件
# 或使用 .flake8 / setup.cfg 文件
# ============================================================
[tool.flake8]
max-line-length = 120
max-complexity = 10
# 严重错误检查 (--select=E9,F63,F7,F82)
select = ["E9", "F63", "F7", "F82"]
extend-ignore = ["E501"]
exclude = [
    ".git",
    ".venv",
    "venv",
    "__pycache__",
    "*.egg-info",
    "logs",
]
per-file-ignores = [
    "__init__.py:F401",
    "tests/*:B,ARG",
]

content.text:
任务执行完成。

## 执行结果

已创建 `pyproject.toml` 文件，包含以下配置：

1. **[project] 元数据**
   - 项目名称: cursorx
   - Python 版本要求: >=3.9
   - 核心依赖从 `requirements.txt` 提取
   - 可选依赖分组: `vector`（向量搜索）、`dev`（开发工具）、`all`

2. **[tool.pytest.ini_options]**
   - `testpaths = ["tests"]`
   - `asyncio_mode = "auto"`
   - 配置测试发现规则和过滤警告

3. **[tool.mypy]**
   - `ignore_missing_imports = true`
   - 额外配置: strict_optional、warn_unused_ignores 等

4. **[tool.ruff]**
   - `line-length = 120`
   - `select` 规则: E, W, F, I, B, C4, UP, ARG, SIM
   - 配置 isort 的 known-first-party 模块

5. **[tool.flake8]**（与 check_all.sh 一致）
   - `max-line-length = 120`
   - `max-complexity = 10`
   - `select = ["E9", "F63", "F7", "F82"]`

> 注意：flake8 不原生支持 pyproject.toml，需安装 `Flake8-pyproject` 插件或使用单独的 `.flake8` 文件。

## 执行结果

已创建 `pyproject.toml` 文件，包含以下配置：

1. **[project] 元数据**
   - 项目名称: cursorx
   - Python 版本要求: >=3.9
   - 核心依赖从 `requirements.txt` 提取
   - 可选依赖分组: `vector`（向量搜索）、`dev`（开发工具）、`all`

2. **[tool.pytest.ini_options]**
   - `testpaths = ["tests"]`
   - `asyncio_mode = "auto"`
   - 配置测试发现规则和过滤警告

3. **[tool.mypy]**
   - `ignore_missing_imports = true`
   - 额外配置: strict_optional、warn_unused_ignores 等

4. **[tool.ruff]**
   - `line-length = 120`
   - `select` 规则: E, W, F, I, B, C4, UP, ARG, SIM
   - 配置 isort 的 known-first-party 模块

5. **[tool.flake8]**（与 check_all.sh 一致）
   - `max-line-length = 120`
   - `max-complexity = 10`
   - `select = ["E9", "F63", "F7", "F82"]`

> 注意：flake8 不原生支持 pyproject.toml，需安装 `Flake8-pyproject` 插件或使用单独的 `.flake8` 文件。
